TopicTitle: First real station.. WHAT should I put up next?

Articles.Content:
Hi guys like the title states, it was a few days ago when I realized that I had never built an actual space station before.. I had put together interplanetary ships but not a station.

So I just now finished putting the kethane module on my "NEW" station.... What else should I send up now?

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Parts It has now.

1, station core, That thing in the center with the hitchhiker

2 observation module, the cupalus at the end.

3 Lab module, that lab on the end.

4 docking module, That four spoked wheel thing with docking ports.

5 an escape module, that big fat craft with the hitchhikers and the missing engine...dont ask

6 The tug, That cute little thing you see on the top with all the SAS units on it,...LOVE that thing!

7 kethane module. Do i really have to explain?

8 solar array, Im going to move that......maybe

Edited March 27, 2014 by Tidus Klein
You could always put some fuel tanks on it. That might allow you to use it as a refuelling point for SSTOs and other rockets.

Yes, fuel tanks are always very useful, and really open up the possibilities of having useful SSTO's (i can never get a SSTO to orbit without emptying the tanks, almost completely), which really creates some fun gameplay!

A module with some autonomous science probes, so you can always launch one, when needed. And a reactor and energy storage module to guarantee the stations functions in case of emergency like crashing into the solar panels f.e.

Also:

- A Mun/Minmus-LKO Shuttle

- SSTO return vehicle (I know you have an escape craft, but its always fun to have a classy way of going home when its not an emergency)

- A bar (I sent one to eve)

Javascript is disabled. View full album

HA thats GREAT!

and Fuel it is! Ill see If I cant send a jumbo up with an arm for refueing at a safe distance.

Edited March 27, 2014 by Tidus Klein
It's not just a bar... it's a... SPACE BAR! </rimshot>
Wow. That bar is awesome. Was that stock parts and can you share the craft file for it?
Love the bar. I will be sure to add one on my asteroid base.

Wow. That bar is awesome. Was that stock parts and can you share the craft file for it?

Yeah, all stock.

Here is the craft file
Have you thought about a military craft - a small fighter - for defense?
